resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: J. & F. Martell : Why these initials ? Because in 1753, when Jean Martell died, it was his sons : Jean and Frédéric who took over the management of the cognac house.
resource.chars: J. & F. Martell : Why these initials ? Because in 1753, when Jean Martell died, it was his sons : Jean and Frédéric who took over the management of the cognac house.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Family coat of arms of the Martell family : it's a heraldic shield representing a seated bird and three hammers. The presence of this coat of arms on the labels made it possible to distinguish this house from the others during export.
resource.chars: Family coat of arms of the Martell family : it's a heraldic shield representing a seated bird and three hammers. The presence of this coat of arms on the labels made it possible to distinguish this house from the others during export.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This label appears on a bottle of Old Brandy ; a Martell cognac. It's an old label of which we don't know exactly the date of production.
resource.chars: This label appears on a bottle of Old Brandy ; a Martell cognac. It's an old label of which we don't know exactly the date of production.
